component.name: Hibiscus
component.summary: Java online banking client using the HBCI standard

description.p: A free Java homebanking application that uses the HBCI4Java implementation and runs as a plugin inside the Jameica framework. Support chipcards key files and PIN/TAN including chipTAN and smsTAN for authentification. Supported file formats include MT940, DTAUS, CSV, Moneyplex and PDF/HTML.
